text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet jdv-hl7-v3-ActPriority-cisis

version: 4; Last updated: 2025-06-25 09:12:22+0000; Language: fr-FR

Profil: Shareable ValueSet

  • Include ces codes sont définis dans http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActPriority
    CodeDisplayDéfinition
    AAussi vite que possibleAs soon as possible, next highest priority after stat.
    CRA contacter dès que les résultats sont disponiblesFiller should contact the placer as soon as results are available, even for preliminary results. (Was "C" in HL7 version 2.3's reporting priority.)
    ELBénéfique pour le patient mais pas essentiel pour sa survieBeneficial to the patient but not essential for survival.
    EMTrès urgentAn unforeseen combination of circumstances or the resulting state that calls for immediate action.
    PA réaliser avant l'interventionUsed to indicate that a service is to be performed prior to a scheduled surgery. When ordering a service and using the pre-op priority, a check is done to see the amount of time that must be allowed for performance of the service. When the order is placed, a message can be generated indicating the time needed for the service so that it is not ordered in conflict with a scheduled operation.
    PRNSi nécessaireAn "as needed" order should be accompanied by a description of what constitutes a need. This description is represented by an observation service predicate as a precondition.
    RA réaliser aux heures ouvréesRoutine service, do at usual work hours.
    RRCompte-rendu urgentA report should be prepared and sent as quickly as possible.
    SImmédiatementWith highest priority (e.g., emergency).
    TPlannification à respecterIt is critical to come as close as possible to the requested time (e.g., for a through antimicrobial level).
    UDMédicament à utiliser selon les directives du prescripteurDrug is to be used as directed by the prescriber.
    URUrgentCalls for prompt action.

name: ActPriority
title: ActPriority
publisher: Agence du Numérique en Santé(ANS) -2 - 10 Rue d'Oradour-sur-Glane, 75015 Paris

concept.display: A contacter dès que les résultats sont disponibles
Bénéfique pour le patient mais pas essentiel pour sa survie
Médicament à utiliser selon les directives du prescripteur
